meta_data.description: 1500 Sq. Ft. - Rent 3 BHK Apartment / Flat in Antriksh Forest, Sector 77 Noida * 10 Property & locality photos * Semifurnished * - 12th floor (out of 21). View contact number for free. Click for complete details on 99acres.com

structured_data.description: Antriksh forest is one of noida's most sought after destination for residential flats and this 3 bhk flat for rent in sector 77 noida, is your opportunity to be a part of this community. This flat consists of 2 bathrooms & 3 balconies build in 829 sq.Ft. Carpet area. The flat is built on 1500 sq.Ft. Area. This property has others as well. Ease of access to 1 covered parking within society. This flat is situated at 12th in a tower with 21 floors. This is a 5-10 years old society. This property is semi-Furnished. Equipped with 12 light, 5 fan, 3 wardrobe, 1 geyser, 1 water purifier, 1 modular kitchen and 1 exhaust fan. The flat will be available from fri, 10 oct 2025 for families, single men and single women on any agreement type with a notice of 1 month for a duration of 11 months. With all the highlighted features, we are asking for  35,000 monthly and is negotiable. Refundable security deposit is  35000. You will also get all modern property feature like reserved parking, piped-Gas, intercom facility, power back-Up, water storage and security / fire alarm. This place is equipped with quality features like swimming pool, fitness centre / gym, club house / community center, park, shopping centre, cctv surveillance, lift(s), security personnel, maintenance staff and visitor parking. Additional things included here are rain water harvesting, corner property, pet friendly, wheelchair friendly and in a gated society. Power backup: Partial. The flat is north-East facing. The flat has vitrified flooring.
